title: Fine
review: This movie is kind of a mess. Great CGI. Great Cinematography. This movie script is 'ok'. Great Acting from Robert Downey Jr. It's not as good as the first iron man but it was okay.

title: Great!
review: If you're not a marvel fan, you will probably not like this movie because this movie has no character development. The director expect you to watch marvel movie before this. I'm a marvel fan, so I'm gonna say this movie is fun.

title: Masterpiece!
review: Dark, Good Acting,Good Cinematography, Amazing Villain, Good Villain Motivation, Looks beautiful and Good Twist.

title: Great
review: Boasting dazzling animation, a script with surprising dramatic depth, and thrilling 3-D sequences, How to Train Your Dragon soars.
